Articles.Content:
After the Crater Mun landings, Voyager Nation set its sight on the not green Duna.

![8ycrMVK.png](http://i.imgur.com/8ycrMVK.png)

The Desert 1 Orbiter marked the first step to a kerbal landing.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-22T08:47:58Z" title="08/22/2015 08:47  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 22, 2015</time> by Voyager275**
and here I am with my Minmus Satellite mission still in design, well done!

> 
> and here I am with my Minmus Satellite mission still in design, well done!

Everybody has to start somewhere

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-09T15:58:30Z" title="08/09/2015 03:58  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 9, 2015</time> by Voyager275**

The next step was to have reliable communication means. 

![acuciA1.png](http://i.imgur.com/acuciA1.png)

Kerbin Duna Comm. on the Launchpad with the Aquarias 1 rocket

![Eu7ypRu.png](http://i.imgur.com/Eu7ypRu.png)

Kerbin Duna Comm. in orbit.

Also due to budget concerns, the lander and impact probes were cancelled and a rover was chosen to be Desert 2. Also the rover carried a gold record for future kerbal explorers to listen too(the light in the middle)

![G40IU7m.png](http://i.imgur.com/G40IU7m.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-09T17:02:25Z" title="08/09/2015 05:02  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 9, 2015</time> by Voyager275**
